name: tsp
description:
Get information on Telephony Service Provider on an account level.

**Scopes:** `tsp:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light` **Prerequisites:**
* A Pro or a higher plan.

$ul: **dial_in_number_unrestricted**: Control restriction on account users adding a TSP number outside of account's dial in numbers.
**enable**: Enable Telephony Service Provider for account users.
**master_account_setting_extended**: For master account, extend its TSP setting to all sub accounts. For sub account, extend TSP setting from master account.
**modify_credential_forbidden**: Control restriction on account users being able to modify their TSP credentials.
**tsp_enabled**: Enable TSP feature for account. This has to be enabled to use any other tsp settings/features.
